typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RCID as string ('1,2'),
	SQNR as string ('3,8'),
	TDNR as string ('11,15'),
	CDGT as string ('26,1'),
	TCNR as string ('27,15'),
	TCND as string ('42,1'),
	TRNC as string ('43,4'),
	FNDT as string ('47,1'),
	RTYP as string ('48,1'),
	INTR1 as string ('49,351')
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FixedTCN1
FixedTCN1 derive(RCID = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($RCID,',')[1]),toInteger(split($RCID,',')[2])),
		SQNR = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($SQNR,',')[1]),toInteger(split($SQNR,',')[2])),
		TDNR = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TDNR,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TDNR,',')[2])),
		CDGT = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($CDGT,',')[1]),toInteger(split($CDGT,',')[2])),
		TCNR = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TCNR,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TCNR,',')[2])),
		TCND = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TCND,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TCND,',')[2])),
		TRNC = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TRNC,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TRNC,',')[2])),
		FNDT = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($FNDT,',')[1]),toInteger(split($FNDT,',')[2])),
		RTYP = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($RTYP,',')[1]),toInteger(split($RTYP,',')[2])),
		INTR1 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($INTR1,',')[1]),toInteger(split($INTR1,',')[2]))) ~> MapFields1
MapFields1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		RCID as string,
		SQNR as string,
		TDNR as string,
		CDGT as string,
		TCNR as string,
		TCND as string,
		TRNC as string,
		FNDT as string,
		RTYP as string,
		INTR1 as string
	),
	filePattern:'TCN_Final_1_[n].csv',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TCN1CSV
